vulnerabilities.title: Improper Neutralization
vulnerabilities.description:
## Overview
[@auth/core](https://www.npmjs.org/package/@auth/core) is an Authentication for the Web.

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Neutralization in the email validation component. An attacker can intercept sensitive authentication emails by submitting a specially crafted email address that manipulates the parsing logic, causing messages to be sent to an unintended mailbox.
## Remediation
Upgrade `@auth/core` to version 0.41.1 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/nextauthjs/next-auth/commit/82efcf81f218aae43683f8dd2f7c260ef69b3ece)
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/nextauthjs/next-auth/commit/8f3b2c7af0fe08973a12f616517c3ec85a5cd172)
vulnerabilities.name: @auth/core

vulnerabilities.title: Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime
vulnerabilities.name: inflight
